Pokies Club

The newly opened Pokies Club at The Ritz-Carlton, Melbourne in Australia offers guests a unique opportunity to enjoy new slot machines and a variety of gambling games including slot machines, blackjack, roulette, baccarat and poker. Poker tables and roulette create an exciting atmosphere for gambling lovers.

Gambling entertainment and recreation

Pokies Club has already gained a high rating among visitors due to its variety of games and extensive selection of slot machines. New slot machines and tables for poker, blackjack, roulette and baccarat provide an unparalleled gaming experience for all visitors.

This club has become one of the best places for those looking for gaming pleasure in the elite atmosphere of The Ritz-Carlton, Melbourne. Guests can enjoy the excitement in luxurious surroundings and enjoy the highest level of service provided by experienced staff.

Operating mode

Daily: from 17.00 to 05.00
